name: headscale
description: Headscale is an open-source control server for Tailscale networks. It manages lightweight peer-to-peer VPN meshes using WireGuard, enabling private secure networking without relying on external cloud services.
features: Tailscale Compatible: Open-source control server compatible with Tailscale clients across all platforms.
WireGuard Mesh: Build secure peer-to-peer VPN networks using modern WireGuard protocol.
Self-Hosted Control: Run your own coordination server without relying on Tailscale's cloud service.
Zero Configuration: Automatic NAT traversal and firewall penetration for seamless connectivity.
Cross-Platform: Connect devices running Linux, macOS, Windows, iOS, and Android.
Access Control: Define which devices can communicate using flexible ACL policies.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage with efficient connection management.
Private Networking: Create secure networks for accessing home services or connecting remote sites.
